mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mbt_notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbt_notice (notice_idx, notice_title, notice_contents, notice_show) VALUES ( (select nvl(max(notice_idx),0)+1 from mbt_notice), #{notice_title}, #{notice_contents}, #{notice_show} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mbt_notice SET notice_title = #{notice_title}, notice_contents = #{notice_contents}, notice_show = #{notice_show} WHERE notice_idx = #{notice_idx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mbt_notice WHERE notice_idx= ${ notice_idx }
